璸字的基本解释

璸
bīn

璸
pián
均见“瑸”。

璸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bīn］
［《集韻》悲巾切，平真，幫。］
“瑸1”的繁体字。
见“璸斒”。
[②]［pián］
［《集韻》蒲眠切，平先，並。］
“瑸2”的繁体字。
珠名。

璸字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璸； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页744第07
【集韻】蒲眠切，音蹁。珠名。　又悲巾切，音份。玉文理貌。　又【五音集韻】文采狀也。【史記·司馬相如傳】璸斒文鱗。　【類篇】或作玭。亦作玢。

璸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
璸字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bīn］
["Ji Yun" is sad, plain, help. ]
"瑸1" in traditional characters.
See "Zhulu".
[②]［pián］
["Ji Yun" Pu Mian cut, level first, merge. ]
"瑸2" in traditional characters.
Bead name.
pearl
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璸; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 744 Page 07
[Jiyun] Pu Mian cuts, and the sound is embarrassing. Bead name.　Sorrowful towel cut again, voice. The appearance of Yuwen.　[Five Yinjiyun] Wen Cai Zhuang Ye. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Zhuhu Wenlin.　【Classes】or Zuoyun. Also known as 玢.
